domainIncludes.comment: A piece of equipment used to hold, protect or secure cargo for logistics purposes.,A referenced piece of equipment used to hold, protect or secure cargo for logistics purposes.TBR: description update to excersize GitHub update
An IOT (Internet of Things) piece of mechanical or electronic equipment which can collect, report and autonomously transmit digital data.
